name: Broccoli AI
headline: AI voice agents for home service businesses
description: At Broccoli AI, we help plumbing, HVAC, and electrical businesses work more efficiently with AI assistants. Our AI handles customer calls, books jobs, and integrates with tools like ServiceTitan.

founders.name: Aditya Ketkar, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ Broccoli AI, building voice agents for the trades

# Convert Every RingInto Revenue
Empower your plumbing, electrical, and HVAC business with an AI phone agent that answers every missed call, books jobs, and supports your customers‚Äîfully integrated with ServiceTitan and other platforms.
[Get In Touch](https://www.broccoli.com/</meetings/intro>)[Try Live Demo!](https://www.broccoli.com/<#callNowForm>)

# Meet your AI Agents
AI agents that sound human, follow your script, show empathy, and are available 24/7. Plus, they're experts in using ServiceTitan and HCP!
CSR
### Dane
I‚Äôm your AI CSR, booking jobs in ServiceTitan and HCP even when your team‚Äôs off. For emergencies, I‚Äôll dispatch the on-call tech and notify them directly.
[Talk To Me](https://www.broccoli.com/<?agent=0#callNowForm>)
Receptionist
### Amy
Welcome! I‚Äôm your AI Receptionist. I‚Äôll greet customers, transfer calls (no more robotic IVRs!), and block those pesky spam calls.
[Talk To Me](https://www.broccoli.com/<?agent=1#callNowForm>)
Happy Call Specialist
### Mark
Hello again! I‚Äôm your AI Happy Calls Specialist, following up to ensure customers are happy with your service and encouraging repeat business.
[Talk To Me](https://www.broccoli.com/<?agent=2#callNowForm>)
Outbound
### More Agents
AI Lead Follow Ups, AI Membership Renewal, AI Open Estimate Follow Ups, and more!
[Get In Touch](https://www.broccoli.com/</meetings/intro>)
Just Launched
### Chat Widget
Let customers book jobs instantly with Broccoli‚Äôs AI-powered chat widget, fully integrated with ServiceTitan and Capacity Planning.
[Get In Touch](https://www.broccoli.com/</meetings/intro>)
# They Took a Bite‚Ä¶ And Loved It!
> Weekend bookings soared **900%** , and customers enjoy seamless, frustration-free scheduling. The AI syncs perfectly with ServiceTitan. We've gone from skeptics to **believers** ‚ÄîAI has truly changed the game!
Marcelle Flowers
CEO, Armstrong Plumbing
![Armstrong Plumbing logo](https://www.broccoli.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcustomers%2Farmstrong_logo.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Atticman Heating & Air logo](https://www.broccoli.com/customers/atticman_logo.svg)
![Any Hour Group logo](https://www.broccoli.com/_next/image?url=%2Fcustomers%2Fanyhourgroup.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Talk to our AI Agents!
Our AI agent will give you a call within a minute, so you can have a real conversation and experience its capabilities firsthand. Remember, this is just a demo‚Äîyour AI agent will be fully customized to fit your business's logic and needs.

Step 1
### AI CSR talks to customer
The AI CSR talks to a customer who wants to request an emergency service.
![AI CSR talks to customer](https://www.broccoli.com/timeline/1.png)
Step 2
### AI books a job straight into ServiceTitan
The AI books a job and assigns the on-call technician on the dispatch board in ServiceTitan.
![AI books a job straight into ServiceTitan](https://www.broccoli.com/timeline/2.png)
Step 3
### AI triggers the on-call technician & manager escalation flow
We have built an escalation flow that triggers a phone call and text message to alert the on-call technician and manager.
![AI triggers the on-call technician & manager escalation flow](https://www.broccoli.com/timeline/3.png)
Step 4
### AI logs the call and keeps the office informed
The AI sends an email with the complete transcript and summary to the service team for their review during office hours.
![AI logs the call and keeps the office informed](https://www.broccoli.com/timeline/4.png)
24 x 7
availability with no breaks
100+
calls at the same time
75+
custom AI voices to choose from

Automate your phone calls with Broccoli AI today.
[Get In Touch](https://www.broccoli.com/</meetings/intro>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Broccoli AI**

Broccoli AI, founded in 2021 and based in San Francisco, operates at the intersection of artificial intelligence and home service industries. As part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, they've been making waves with their innovative approach to enhancing efficiency for plumbing, HVAC, and electrical businesses through AI voice agents.

**Mission and Product Offering**

The core mission of Broccoli AI is straightforward yet powerful: to equip home service businesses with AI voice agents that manage customer interactions seamlessly. Their AIs handle customer calls, book jobs, and integrate effortlessly with platforms like ServiceTitan. This means that for many businesses, missed calls‚Äîand the revenue they represent‚Äîare swiftly transformed into appointments.

**Current Operations**

The company employs a lean team of eight, driving innovation in a competitive space. Services offered include 24/7 customer support through AI agents that mimic human empathy and understanding. These agents can:
- Act as a Customer Service Representative (CSR), booking jobs even after hours.
- Serve as a receptionist to greet customers and filter spam calls.
- Follow up with customers post-service to ensure satisfaction and encourage repeat business.

Broccoli AI also recently launched a chat widget, enabling instant job bookings directly through their website, a feature anticipated to enhance user experience further.

**Growth and Integration**

Early adopters have witnessed remarkable success; Marcelle Flowers, CEO of Armstrong Plumbing, reported a staggering 900% increase in weekend bookings since implementing Broccoli‚Äôs service. Integration with ServiceTitan and other tools signifies their commitment to providing a comprehensive solution for service businesses.

**Team and Leadership**

Led by a capable team and supported by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, Broccoli AI is positioned for dominance in this niche. They're not just selling a service; they're redefining how home service industries interact with customers.

**In Summary**

Broccoli AI has carved out a unique place in the market by leveraging technology to solve real-world problems for service providers. Their focus on AI-driven voice agents presents a clear value proposition: turning every missed call into a revenue opportunity, along with keeping customer satisfaction at the forefront. 

Want to get started with your own AI agent? Check them out at [Broccoli AI](https://www.broccoli.com/).
